advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: A user may gain access to protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An archive may be able to bypass Gatekeeper
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Brandon Dalton (@partyD0lphin) of Red Canary and Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Offensive Security

advisories.impact: Importing a maliciously crafted calendar invitation may exfiltrate user information
advisories.description: Multiple validation issues were addressed with improved input sanitization.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read arbitrary files
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to cause unexpected system termination or write kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory initialization issue was addressed.

advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause unexpected system termination or corrupt kernel memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: Processing a font file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: Parsing a maliciously crafted plist may lead to an unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted file may lead to unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to disclose kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read issue existed that led to the disclosure of kernel memory. This was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

cves.credit: Félix Poulin-Bélanger and David Pan Ogea

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Xinru Chi of Pangu Lab and Ned Williamson of Google Project Zero

advisories.impact: An app with root privileges may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to disclose kernel memory
advisories.description: A validation issue was addressed with improved input sanitization.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed through improved input validation.

cves.credit: Pan ZhenPeng of STAR Labs SG Pte. Ltd.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to view sensitive information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with additional sandbox restrictions.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted file may lead to unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: A user in a privileged network position may be able to spoof a VPN server that is configured with EAP-only authentication on a device
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved authentication.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Mickey Jin (@patch1t), Koh M. Nakagawa of FFRI Security, Inc., and Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Offensive Security

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: A shortcut may be able to use sensitive data with certain actions without prompting the user
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with additional permissions checks.

cves.credit: Jubaer Alnazi Jabin of TRS Group Of Companies and Wenchao Li and Xiaolong Bai of Alibaba Group

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Guilherme Rambo of Best Buddy Apps (rambo.codes)

advisories.impact: Multiple issues in Vim
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed by updating to Vim version 9.0.1191.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to break out of its sandbox
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with a new entitlement.
